name: Sidebar
description: Sidebar is a panel component displayed as an overlay.

properties.name: appendTo
properties.description: DOM element instance where the overlay panel should be mounted. Valid values are any DOM Element and self. The self value is used to render a component where it is located.

properties.name: ariaCloseLabel
properties.description: Aria label of the close icon.

properties.name: baseZIndex
properties.description: Base zIndex value to use in layering.

properties.name: blockScroll
properties.description: Whether to block scrolling of the document when sidebar is active.

properties.name: children
properties.description: Used to get the child elements of the component.

properties.name: closeIcon
properties.description: Icon of the close button.

properties.name: closeOnEscape
properties.description: Specifies if pressing escape key should hide the sidebar.

properties.name: content
properties.description: Specifies a custom content for the sidebar. For more complex markup, use the "content" slot instead.

properties.name: dismissable
properties.description: Whether to dismiss sidebar on click of the mask.

properties.name: fullScreen
properties.description: Adds a close icon to the header to hide the dialog.

properties.name: header
properties.description: Custom template for the header.

properties.name: icons
properties.description: Custom icons template for the header.

properties.name: maskClassName
properties.description: Style class of the mask.

properties.name: maskStyle
properties.description: Inline style of the mask.

properties.name: modal
properties.description: Whether to a modal layer behind the sidebar.

properties.name: position
properties.description: Specifies the position of the sidebar, valid values are "left" and "right".

properties.name: pt
properties.description: Uses to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

properties.name: ptOptions
properties.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

properties.name: showCloseIcon
properties.description: Whether to display a close icon inside the panel.

properties.name: transitionOptions
properties.description: The properties of CSSTransition can be customized, except for "nodeRef" and "in" properties.

properties.name: unstyled
properties.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: Specifies the visibility of the dialog.

callbacks.name: onHide
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when the actions used to close the sidebar are triggered. Exp; close icon, mask and esc key.

callbacks.name: onShow
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when sidebar gets shown.

methods.name: getCloseIcon
methods.description: Used to get close icon element.
